locations.title: Egypt
locations.description: is a country spanning the northeast corner of Africa and southwest corner of Asia by a land bridge formed by the Sinai Peninsula.

locations.title: Western Sahara
locations.description: Western Sahara is a disputed territory on the northwest coast and in the Maghreb region of North and West Africa, partially controlled by the self-proclaimed Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic and partially occupied by neighboring Morocco.

locations.title: Tunisia
locations.description: Tunisia is a country in the Maghreb region of North Africa. Tunisia is bordered by Algeria to the west and southwest, Libya to the southeast, and the Mediterranean Sea to the north and east.

locations.title: Libya
locations.description: Libya is a country in the Maghreb region in North Africa, bordered by the Mediterranean Sea to the north, Egypt to the east, Sudan to the southeast, Chad to the south.

locations.title: Morocco
locations.description: Morocco is a country located in the Maghreb region of North Africa. It overlooks the Mediterranean Sea to the north and the Atlantic Ocean to the west, with land border with Algeria to the east and Western Sahara to the south.

locations.title: Mauritania
locations.description: Mauritania is a country in Northwest Africa. It is the eleventh largest sovereign state in Africa and is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the west, Western Sahara to the north and northwest.

locations.title: South Sudan
locations.description: South Sudan officially known as the Republic of South Sudan is a landlocked country in East-Central Africa. It gained independence from the Republic of the Sudan in 2011, making it the most recent sovereign state with widespread recognition.

locations.title: Niger
locations.description: Niger is a landlocked country in West Africa named after the Niger River. Niger is bordered by Libya to the northeast, Chad to the east, Nigeria to the south.

locations.title: Mali
locations.description: Mali is the eighth-largest country in Africa, with an area of just over 1,240,000 square kilometres (480,000 sq mi). The population of Mali is 19.1 million.

locations.title: Eritrea
locations.description: Eritrea is a country in the Horn of Africa in East Africa, with its capital at Asmara. It is bordered by Sudan in the west, Ethiopia in the south, and Djibouti in the southeast. The northeastern and eastern parts of Eritrea have an extensive coastline along the Red Sea.

locations.title: Chad
locations.description: Chad officially known as the Republic of Chad is bordered by Libya to the north and Sudan to the east. Chad has several regions: a desert zone in the north and an arid Sahelian belt.

locations.title: Ethiopia
locations.description: Ethiopia officially the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, is a landlocked country in the Horn of Africa. It shares borders with Eritrea to the north.

locations.title: Somalia
locations.description: Somalia is a sovereign country located in the Horn of Africa. It is bordered by Ethiopia to the west, the Gulf of Aden to the north.

locations.title: Djibouti
locations.description: Djibouti is a country located in the Horn of Africa. It is bordered by Somalia in the south, Ethiopia in the south and west, Eritrea in the north.

locations.title: Kenya
locations.description: Kenya is a country in Africa with 47 semi-autonomous counties governed by elected governors.

locations.title: Sudan
locations.description: Sudan is a country in northeastern Africa. It is bordered by Egypt to the north, Libya to the northwest.

locations.title: Eswatini
locations.description: Eswatini is a landlocked country in Southern Africa. It is bordered by Mozambique to its northeast and South Africa to its north, west, and south.

locations.title: South Africa
locations.description: South Africa is the southernmost country in Africa. It is bounded to the south by 2,798 kilometres (1,739 mi) of coastline of Southern Africa stretching along the South Atlantic and Indian Oceans.

locations.title: Botswana
locations.description: Botswana is a landlocked country in Southern Africa. Formerly the British protectorate of Bechuanaland, Botswana adopted its name after becoming independent within the Commonwealth on 30 September 1966.

locations.title: Angola
locations.description: Angola is a country on the west coast of Southern Africa. It is the seventh-largest country in Africa.

locations.title: Angola
locations.description: Angola is a country on the west coast of Southern Africa. It is the seventh-largest country in Africa.

locations.title: Namibia
locations.description: Namibia is a country in Southern Africa. Its western border is the Atlantic Ocean; it shares land borders with Zambia and Angola to the north.

locations.title: Zimbabwe
locations.description: Zimbabwe is a landlocked country located in Southern Africa, between the Zambezi and Limpopo Rivers, bordered by South Africa, Botswana, Zambia and Mozambique.

locations.title: Madagascar
locations.description: Madagascar is an island country in the Indian Ocean, approximately 400 kilometres (250 miles) off the coast of East Africa. At 592,800 square kilometres (228,900 sq mi) Madagascar is the world's 2nd largest island country.

locations.title: Mozambique
locations.description: Mozambique is a country located in Southeast Africa bordered by the Indian Ocean to the east, Tanzania to the north, Malawi and Zambia to the northwest, Zimbabwe to the west.

locations.title: Malawi
locations.description: Malawi is a landlocked country in Southeastern Africa that was formerly known as Nyasaland. It is bordered by Zambia to the west, Tanzania to the north and northeast, and Mozambique surrounding on the east, south and southwest.

locations.title: Zambia
locations.description: Zambia is a landlocked country in Southern-Central Africa. Its neighbours are the Democratic Republic of the Congo to the north, Tanzania to the north-east.

locations.title: Republic of the Congo
locations.description: Republic of the Congo is a country located in the western coast of Central Africa.

locations.title: Democratic Republic of the Congo
locations.description: Democratic Republic of the Congo is a country located in Central Africa. It was formerly called Zaire. It is, by area, the largest country in sub-Saharan Africa.

locations.title: Gabon
locations.description: Gabon is a country on the west coast of Central Africa. Located on the equator, Gabon is bordered by Equatorial Guinea to the northwest.

locations.title: Equatorial Guinea
locations.description: Equatorial Guinea is a country located on the west coast of Central Africa, with an area of 28,000 square kilometres (11,000 sq mi).

locations.title: Cameroon
locations.description: Cameroon is a country in Central Africa. It is bordered by Nigeria to the west and north; Chad to the northeast.

locations.title: Nigeria
locations.description: Nigeria is a country in West Africa, bordering Niger in the north, Chad in the northeast, Cameroon in the east, and Benin in the west.

locations.title: Benin
locations.description: Benin is a country in West Africa. It is bordered by Togo to the west, Nigeria to the east, Burkina Faso to the north-west.

locations.title: Togo
locations.description: Togo is a country in West Africa bordered by Ghana to the west, Benin to the east and Burkina Faso to the north.

locations.title: Ghana
locations.description: Ghana is a country located along the Gulf of Guinea and Atlantic Ocean, in the subregion of West Africa.

locations.title: Côte d'Ivoire
locations.description: Côte d'Ivoire, also known as The Ivory Coast is a country located on the south coast of West Africa.

locations.title: Liberia
locations.description: Liberia is a country on the West African coast. It is bordered by Sierra Leone to its northwest, Guinea to its north, Ivory Coast to its east.

locations.title: Burkina Faso
locations.description: Burkina Faso is a landlocked country in West Africa. It covers an area of around 274,200 square kilometres (105,900 sq mi) and is surrounded by six countries.

locations.title: Sierra Leone
locations.description: Sierra Leone is a country on the southwest coast of West Africa. It is bordered by Liberia to the southeast and Guinea to the northeast.

locations.title: Guinea
locations.description: Guinea is a west-coastal country in West Africa. Formerly known as French Guinea.

locations.title: The Gambia
locations.description: The Gambia is a country in Western Africa that is almost entirely surrounded by Senegal with the exception of its western coastline along the Atlantic Ocean.

locations.title: Guinea Bissau
locations.description: Guinea Bissau is a country in West Africa that covers 36,125 square kilometres (13,948 sq mi) with an estimated population of 1,874,303. It borders Senegal to the north and Guinea to the south-east.

locations.title: Senegal
locations.description: Senegal is a country in West Africa. Senegal is bordered by Mauritania in the north, Mali to the east, Guinea to the southeast.

locations.title: Central African Republic
locations.description: Central African Republic is a landlocked country in Central Africa. It is bordered by Chad to the north, Sudan to the northeast, South Sudan to the southeast

locations.title: Tanzania
locations.description: Tanzania is a country in East Africa within the African Great Lakes region. It borders Uganda to the north; Kenya to the northeast.

locations.title: Burundi
locations.description: Burundi is a landlocked country in the Great Rift Valley where the African Great Lakes region and East Africa converge.

locations.title: Rwanda
locations.description: Rwanda is a country in Central Africa and one of the smallest countries on the African mainland, and its capital city is Kigali.

locations.title: Uganda
locations.description: Uganda, officially the Republic of Uganda is a landlocked country in East-Central Africa. It is bordered to the east by Kenya, to the north by South Sudan.

locations.title: Algeria
locations.description: Algeria is a country in the Maghreb region of North Africa. The capital and most populous city is Algiers, located in the far north of the country on the Mediterranean coast.
